content.rendered:
It’s not where you live, it’s where you belong!

No matter what point you are at in your education, living on campus is one of the best ways to immerse yourself in our community. Our campus residents form bonds with their hall mates through housing programs and have access to a wide range of campus resources. On-campus housing is where your journey begins!

Why Live on Campus?

Studies have shown that some students who live on campus are more involved, get better grades, and are more likely to graduate. The work you will do in the classroom is only part of the full college experience. To make the most of your time, you have to fully immerse yourself in the university community, and there is no better way to do that than living on campus.

You will be able to attend events, spend time with friends, and have ample space to study. You will also have access to standard amenities such as wireless internet, laundry facilities, and a variety of on-campus dining options to explore.

Our residents are also steps away from great restaurants and shopping in Downtown La Verne, and more shopping centers are a little more than a mile away, so you’ll have access to everything you need.

Housing Options

With a variety of housing options, you’ll find the one that’s right for you. Explore all of the amenities our three main on-campus housing options have to offer.

Check out Housing
On-Campus Dining

You’ve got great options when dining on campus. Grab a quick bite at Barbara’s Place or sit down for a full buffet style meal at our dining hall, The Spot.

Explore Meal Plans
How to Apply

Ready to join our on-campus resident community? Learn more about the three easy steps to apply for housing and housing application timeline.

Apply Now
Resident Resources

Now that you’re settling into our community, find all the information you need to have the best on-campus resident experience. Requires login.

Learn More
